name: Salem Fair
description:
This is a flatgame submission that documents an experience I had in the summer of 2016.

Use the 'W' 'A' 'S' 'D' keys to move. The game will automatically open a streaming-radio tab. If it doesn't work, disable Adblocker or your pop-up blocker.

I forgot to take out the debug button (which can make you stuck). So if you can't move, try pressing `
